name: Lustra® Body Shampoo 270 High Lubricity
description: Lustra® Body Shampoo 270 High Lubricity is an ultra-concentrated high foaming liquid detergent that produces thick, rich lather with excellent lubricity and cleaning ability. In car wash systems foam, cloth and brushes glide easily over a vehicle’s surface. Contains a highly effective surfactant and polymer for maximum cleaning and economics. It is specially formulated for new-technology foam materials.
